title: Accidental shooting hospitalizes juvenile at Kissimmee resort
content:
© 2017 Cox Media Group.
KISSIMMEE, Fla. - A juvenile is in the hospital after an accidental shooting at a resort in Kissimmee near Old Town, according to Osceola County Fire Rescue.
The shooting occurred shortly before 5:37 p.m. at the Seralago Hotel & Suites on W. Irlo Bronson Memorial Highway, according to Osceola County Sheriff’s deputies.
Firefighters said the juvenile was taken to Osceola County Regional Medical Center as a trauma alert.
No further details have been released at this time.
